response.original_title: Spike and Mike's Festival of Animation '95
response.overview: See the theatrical premiere of Oscar winning BOB'S BIRTHDAY, one of 13 animated short films from four countries which demonstrates a wide range of styles and techniques, from traditional cel animation to cutting edge computer and claymation wizardry. Other program highlights include 1995's other Academy Award nominees THE BIG STORY, TRIANGLE, THE JANITOR, and THE MONK AND THE FISH. The program is topped off with an encore screening of THE WRONG TROUSERS. Nick Park's claymation masterpiece follows the richly detailed misadventures of Wallace and Gromit - an eccentric inventor and his faithful dog.
response.title: Spike and Mike's Festival of Animation '95
